meaningMnemonic: The <radical>soul</radical> of the <radical>Death Star</radical> is actually quite <kanji>pleasant</kanji>. And if you think about it, it's the people who control the Death Star that are evil and kill.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>pleasant</kanji> soul within the Death Star actually looks like a <reading>yu</reading>rt (ゆ), not a big angry, metal ball.
